org.apache.hadoop.hbase.http.conf

Class TestConfServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert

        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.http.conf.TestConfServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class TestConfServlet
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Basic test case that the ConfServlet can write configuration to its output in XML and JSON format.
